privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.intro: FIVE Consulting values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data.

collection.title: 1. Information We Collect
collection.description: We may collect personal information such as name, email, phone number, and professional details provided voluntarily when you contact us or subscribe to our newsletter.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Your Data
usage.description: We use your data to respond to inquiries, send relevant content, provide contracted services, improve user experience, and comply with legal obligations.

sharing.title: 3. Data Sharing
sharing.description: We do not share your information with third parties unless necessary to deliver services or required by law.

security.title: 4. Information Security
security.description: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, destruction, loss, or alteration.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your website experience, analyze traffic, and personalize content. You can manage cookie preferences in our consent banner.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.description: Under the LGPD, you have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. Contact us at contato@fiveconsulting.com.br.

changes.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: This policy may be updated periodically. The latest version will always be available on this page.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.description: Please carefully read the terms and conditions that govern the use of this website and our services.
terms.intro: These Terms of Use govern the use of the website and our services. By accessing or using any functionality, you fully agree to these terms.

accuracy.title: 4. Information Accuracy
